{/* Subject View Section */}

Subject View

This section can be used to display subject details.

{/* Resource Search Section */}

Search Results

Display your search results here based on the subject search.

{/* Contribute Section */}

Contribute

This section allows users to upload or contribute resources.

{/* Other Useful OERs Section */}

Other Useful OERs

Display other useful Open Educational Resources.

{/* Contributors Section */}

Contributors

Display contributors' names and contributions.

{/* Self-Directed Learning Section */}

Self-Directed Learning

This section focuses on self-directed learning resources.

{/* Account Creation Section */}

Account Creation

This section allows users to register for an account.

{/* Password Reset Section */}

Password Reset

This section allows users to reset their passwords.

{/* About Us Section */}

About Us

Share2Teach is a vibrant open educational resource project nurturing a global community of learners and educators.

{/* FAQ Section */}

FAQ

Frequently Asked Questions section to guide users.
